item.title: Sears' hat trick sees USWNT close window in rout
item.description: Emma Sears scored a hat trick as the United States closed out the October window with a one-sided 6-0 win over New Zealand on Wednesday in Kansas City...

item.title: Jays ride Yesavage's record 12 K's to cusp of title
item.description: Trey Yesavage set a World Series rookie record with 12 strikeouts, propelling the Blue Jays past the Dodgers 6-1 and moving them one win away from the...

item.title: Dodgers' bats flail again, putting season on brink
item.description: The Dodgers' offense fell flat again, managing four hits while striking out 15 times in a 6-1 loss to the Blue Jays that put them in a 3-2 hole in the...

item.title: Reaves' run rolls on as buzzer-beater lifts Lakers
item.description: Austin Reaves continued his dream week, adding to a 51-point performance and a 41-point game with a floater at the buzzer that rescued the Lakers.
